snippet: The ambassador to the United Nations from Jordan said he would renew his appeal to the governing body to visit countries that shelter millions of Syrian refugees, including his own.
abstract: Prince Zeid Ra'ad Zeid al-Hussein, ambassador to the United Nations from Jordan, says that he will renew his appeal to the Security Council to visit countries that shelter millions of Syrian refugees.
lead_paragraph: The ambassador to the United Nations from Jordan said he would renew his appeal to the governing body to visit countries that shelter millions of Syrian refugees, including his own.

headline.main: Jordan to Renew Appeal on Syrian Refugees

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
